subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Body Building
lead_paragraph: Mr. Scott, who won the first and second Mr. Olympia competitions in the 1960s, also became Mr. America and Mr. Universe while influencing a generation of weight lifters.
snippet: Mr. Scott, who won the first and second Mr. Olympia competitions in the 1960s, also became Mr. America and Mr. Universe while influencing a generation of weight lifters.
